articles.title: 'PUBG' adds bots to PC matches - Engadget
articles.description: 'PUBG' now includes bots to give new players a fighting chance.
articles.content: These bots will only appear in normal games, and will crop up more infrequently as a player’s skill increases. Their actions are limited to basics such as walk, run, crouch and shoot, as well as basic low height parkour, swimming, parachuting and looting. The… [+2265 chars]

articles.author: Liam Tung
articles.title: Microsoft: Linux GUI apps coming to Windows 10 WSL along with GPU access - ZDNet
articles.description: Microsoft also wants its DirectX-based Linux GPU kernel driver upstreamed to the Linux kernel, but there's resistance.
articles.content:
Windows 10's Windows System for Linux (WSL) will soon let developers run Linux GUI apps, while Linux guests on Windows will soon gain access to GPU power for hardware acceleration.    
WSL is currently only available via the console, but WSL2 will let develo… [+3384 chars]

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Note 20 might ditch S20 Ultra's pointless camera feature - Android Authority
articles.description: Samsung's Galaxy S20 Ultra touted 100x zoom, but it was useless for the most part.
articles.content:
The Samsung Galaxy S20 Ultra had arguably the best camera specs on paper in 2020, featuring a 108MP main camera and a 48MP 4x periscope camera.
In fact, Samsung touted a 100x Space Zoom feature on the device, claiming 100x zoom. Now, frequent leaker Ice Univ… [+1067 chars]

articles.title: 'Animal Crossing' items glitch: Get infinite gold, NMT, and Star Fragments - Inverse
articles.description: Another item duplication glitch has been found in 'Animal Crossing: New Horizons' for Nintendo Switch, and it can be used to get an infinite number f Nook Miles Tickets — or anything your heart desires.
